and func.FUNC_DELETED = '0' and func.APP_SOFT_ID = #{appSoftId}
and ( func.FUNC_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') or func.FUNC_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') or func.FUNC_ICON_CSS like concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') or func.SMALL_IMG_PATH like concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') )
order by func.FUNC_SORT_NO asc ,func.CREATE_TIME asc
